title: Executive Order 7854-Revocation of Executive Order No. 6055 of February 28, 1933, Withdrawing Public Lands
content: By virtue of and pursuant to the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910, ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847, as amended by the act of August 24, 1912, ch. 369, 37 Stat. 497, Executive Order No. 6055 of February 28, 1933, withdrawing public lands in Colorado pending a resurvey, is hereby revoked.
This order shall become effective upon the date of the official fling of the plat of the resurvey of the said lands.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 7854-Revocation of Executive Order No. 6055 of February 28, 1933, Withdrawing Public Lands Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/371849
